short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Saved multiple URLs at once

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Saved Bulk URL Opener" is a versatile browser extension designed to streamline the process of opening multiple URLs simultaneously. With Bulk URL Opener, users can effortlessly open a large number of URLs in new tabs with just a few clicks, saving time and effort. Whether you're a researcher, marketer, or simply a frequent browser user, Bulk URL Opener empowers you to efficiently manage and access multiple web pages at once.

Use Option page (right click on extension) to open Individual saved URL / delete the saved URL.

To save URL just input the URL and click on "Add URL" button. It will get saved and you can view it in options page.
